text: With pinpoint accuracy, the trident soars through the air, finding its mark with deadly impunity!
With pinpoint accuracy, the trident soars through the air, finding its mark with deadly impunity!
From the Heavens themselves, arrows pour on your hapless foes!
Show the whelps before you the true might of the bows of the Xianbei!

None can survive the Heaven-splitting strike of Pan Feng! As long as he doesn't trip.
